actions.name: Actions
actions.description:
Multi-Attack: 2×Claw and 1×Bite
Bite [Melee Attack]: 7 (2d6)
Claw [Melee Attack]: 4 (d8)
Slam [Melee Attack]: 7 (2d6) and Prone if this Being moved at least 20 feet straight toward the Target before the attack.

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description:
Amphibious: It can breathe air and water.
Dreadnought: Deals double damage to vehicles.
